+971-526363900/+91-8130226505;  abhishek_narkhede@yahoo.co.in / adn.abhishek@gmail.com
Flat 216, Building 214, Discovery Gardens, Dubai, UAE
SENIOR PROCESS ENGINEERING PROFESSIONAL (15+ Years Experience)
Seeking challenging assignments across the Industry
PROFILE
Process (Chemical) Engineer with progressive experience in driving business growth & fostering process efficiency in multi-faceted projects, currently spearheading efforts as Senior Process Engineer with WOOD Group, DUBAI, UAE.
Rich Overseas Experience (United Kingdom & UAE) of 6 years.
A planner & strategist with strong background in implementing process improvements & quality initiatives. Keen to work on Concept design/Basic/Detailed Engineering & Process simulation; Process Calculation, validation of Process Design & Process conditions, preparation of PFDs, P&IDs, Utility distribution diagrams & technical evaluation of manufacturer’s/vendor’s offers.
Accountable for resolving Client queries, Project issues, providing first time resolution, handling escalated issues and maintaining highest standards of service, promptly resolving problems & concerns; familiar with various National & International codes such as API, NACE, Shell DEPs, ASME, IBR etc.
A proactive professional who can lead teams, rapidly identify problems, formulate tactical plans, initiate change and implement effective programs in challenging and diverse environments; well adaptive towards corporate culture and behavior & ability to work under pressure with proven strength in problem solving, co-ordination and analysis.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Software Skills:              Aspen HYSYS v11, Pro/ II v 9.3, Aspen FLARENET v9, UniSim v460.2, BR&E ProMax v3.2, AutoCAD 2007,
KG Tower, Aspen Zyqad 2006, Smart Plant Instrumentation (SPI), AFT Fathom & Arrow, C Language
Operating Systems:      Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 10
Packages:                        MS Office’10 (MS Excel, MS Word, MS Visio and MS PowerPoint)
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
WOOD Group PSN, Dubai, UAE									 (Since Jan’23)
Senior Process Engineer
COMPANY PROFILE: WOOD Group is LSE listed and one of the world’s leading consulting and engineering companies operating across the Energy and Materials markets; and has operations throughout the world.
BECHTEL India Private Limited, Gurgaon (Delhi - NCR), Haryana, India                                                                   (Aug’18 - Jan’23)
Senior/Lead Process Engineer
COMPANY PROFILE: BECHTEL is one of the most respected an	d largest global EPCM organization taking LSTK/FEED jobs for Process, Oil & Gas (LNG), Petrochemical & Chemical plants; and has operations throughout the world.
FLUOR Daniel India Private Limited, Gurgaon (Delhi - NCR), Haryana, India                            (Aug ’11 – May’12) & (Oct ’16-Jul’18)
FLUOR Limited, Farnborough, United Kingdom (UK)                                                                                                          (May ’12-Oct’16)
Process Specialist (Process Technology)
COMPANY PROFILE: FLUOR is a Global Fortune 500 and NYSE listed EPCM organization taking LSTK/FEED jobs for Process, Oil & Gas, Petrochemical & Chemical plants; and has operations throughout the world.
TECNIMONT Private Limited (formerly TECNIMONT ICB Pvt Ltd – TICB), Mumbai, Maharashtra, India             (Jun ’08 – Aug’11)
Process Engineer/Trainee Process Engineer
COMPANY PROFILE: TECNIMONT Private Limited is a part of the Maire Tecnimont group and Italy listed EPC organization taking LSTK jobs for Process, Oil & Gas, Petrochemical & Fertilizer plants; and has operations in Europe, Middle East and India.
Experience in various Process Engineering activities like:
Process Flow Diagrams (PFDs), Material Selection Diagrams (MSDs), Piping & Instrumentation Diagrams (P&IDs) (Development & Detailing)
Process Simulation and Heat & Mass Balance(H&MB)
Line sizing & Pressure drop Calculations including two phase lines (Unit Hydraulics of Pumps, Compressors etc)
Equipment Process datasheets (PDS) (of Heat Exchangers, Vessels, Pumps, Filters, Desuperheaters, Fired Heaters, Compressors etc) & Equipment sizing.
Column Hydraulics using Koch-Glitsch proprietary sof

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
